name: Habanero Inferno Sauce
description: Experience the fiery heat of habanero peppers in this intense hot sauce. Made with hand-picked habaneros for maximum flavor and heat.

name: Ghost Pepper Blaze Sauce
description: Get ready for a taste adventure with the scorching heat of ghost peppers. This sauce will leave you breathless with its intense spiciness.

name: Carolina Reaper Fury Sauce
description: Feel the wrath of the Carolina Reaper, one of the hottest peppers in the world. This sauce is not for the faint-hearted!

name: Sriracha Sensation Sauce
description: Indulge in the tangy and spicy goodness of Sriracha sauce. Perfect for adding a kick to your favorite dishes.

name: Jalapeno Zing Sauce
description: Discover the delightful balance of heat and flavor with this zesty Jalapeno sauce. Adds a kick to any meal without overpowering the taste buds.
